abstract: The LG Super Blu Player BH200 will cost around $999 when it makes its way to stores next month.
snippet: The LG Super Blu Player BH200 will cost around $999 when it makes its way to stores next month.
lead_paragraph: The high-definition format wars are not as scary for the movie-watching public as they once were, thanks to dual-format players that can handle movies on either HD DVD or Blu-ray discs. LG Electronics, which this year released the first dual-format player, has just announced its successor  the LG Super Blu Player BH200.

headline.main: Above the Format Wars, a Player for HD DVD and Blu-ray
headline.print_headline: Above the Format Wars, a Player for HD DVD and Blu-ray

abstract: James E. Press has been lured away from Toyota as Chrysler transforms itself as a private company.
snippet: James E. Press has been lured away from Toyota as Chrysler transforms itself as a private company.
lead_paragraph: AUBURN HILLS, Mich., Sept. 6 — Chrysler said today that it had hired the highest-ranking American at Toyota, James E. Press, as its new vice chairman and co-president. The move came only weeks after Chrysler, which was purchased by Cerberus Capital Management on Aug. 3, hired the former head of Home Depot to become its chief executive.

headline.main: Chrysler Hires a Top Toyota Executive

byline.original: By Nick Bunkley and Micheline Maynard
